description:
At the top of the Mythical Tower resides the shadow of King Gilgamesh, and it is affecting the real Gilgamesh. Neeba and Kaaya are climbing toward the top of the tower in order to take the shadow down. In their pursuit, Jil and his gang enter a floor with a yellow sky, a terrifying place where monsters that are the shadows of children attack anyone who enters one after another. Jil and the gang are cornered...
Source: crunchyroll
